channel.title: CVE Feed for techjewel -- Email Marketing, Newsletter, Email Automation and CRM Plugin for WordPress by FluentCRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for techjewel -- Email Marketing, Newsletter, Email Automation and CRM Plugin for WordPress by FluentCRM

item.title: CVE-2023-1430|2024-08-02T05:49:11.569Z -- techjewel -- email%20marketing%2C%20newsletter%2C%20email%20automation%20and%20crm%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20by%20fluentcrm
item.description: The FluentCRM - Marketing Automation For WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data in versions up to, and including, 2.7.40 due to the use of an MD5 hash without a salt to control subscriptions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to unsubscribe users from lists and manage subscriptions, granted they gain access to any targeted subscribers email address.
